typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		na_code as string,
		na_desc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> tNotApplicable
source(output(
		dimension_name as string,
		top_key as string,
		top_desc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> tTopGroup
source(output(
		dimension_key as long,
		top_id as decimal(28,10),
		cpt_number as decimal(28,10),
		cpt_key as string,
		top_description as string,
		cpt_id as decimal(28,10),
		cpt_description as string,
		top_key as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> LKPDimCapital
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select max(dimension_key) as maxval from marts.dim_capital',
	format: 'query') ~> source1
tTopGroup filter(dimension_name=='dim_capital') ~> Filter1
tNotApplicable derive(top_key = 'ALL',
		top_desc = 'All Capital') ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1, Filter1 union(byName: true)~> Union1
ConditionalSplit1@OnlyTop keyGenerate(output(undefined as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 derive() ~> DerivedColumn2
Union1 split(isNull(na_code),
	na_code!= '',
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(OnlyTop, NaExist)
DerivedColumn2 sink(input(
		dimension_key as long,
		top_id as decimal(28,10),
		cpt_number as decimal(28,10),
		cpt_key as string,
		top_description as string,
		cpt_id as decimal(28,10),
		cpt_description as string,
		top_key as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		top_description = top_desc,
		top_key
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
